plot: After having his heart broken, a man spends thirty years building a time machine so he can go back and make sure he never met the woman who broke his heart.
title: Same Time Same Place
plot_es: After having his heart broken, a man spends thirty years building a time machine so he can go back and make sure he never met the woman who broke his heart.
plot_en: After having his heart broken, a man spends thirty years building a time machine so he can go back and make sure he never met the woman who broke his heart.
